          <title>
            <string language="en">Temperature of planets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Temperatur der Planeten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La température des planètes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Temperatura dos planetas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Temperatura dei pianeti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμοκρασία των πλανητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Temperatura de planetas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This line graph shows the temperature of the planets in terms of their distance from the Sun.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Zeile Diagramm zeigt die Temperatur der 
Planeten in ihrem Abstand von der Sonne ausgedrückt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphe par ligne montre la température des 
planètes en termes de leur distance du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta linha gráfico mostra a temperatura dos 
planetas nos termos de sua distância do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico lineare mostra la temperatura dei 
pianeti in termini di loro distanza dal sole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση γραμμών εμφανίζει τη 
θερμοκρασία των πλανητών από την άποψη της απόστασής τους από 
τον ήλιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta línea gráfico muestra la temperatura de los
planetas en términos de su distancia del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
